_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: TrackMania Nations Forever / United Forever
author: info@gamemania.org
description: TrackMania Nations Forever / United Forever Dedicated Server with xAseco

installation.script:
#!/bin/sh
# TRACKMANIA NF UF Installation Script
#
## Vars
DEDICATED_URL="http://files2.trackmaniaforever.com/TrackmaniaServer_2011-02-21.zip"
TRACKLIST_URL="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Hoerli1337/pterodactyl-eggs/master/TMNF-UF/tracklist.txt"
XASECO_DL="https://fastdl.gamemania.org/xaseco1.16-php7.zip"
#USER="container"
WORKDIR="/mnt/server"

mkdir -pv ${WORKDIR}
cd ${WORKDIR}

## Install Stuff to run xaseco.
apk add --no-cache --update ca-certificates wget unzip tar bash fontconfig php7 php7-fpm php7-gd php7-xml php7-curl php7-mysqli php7-zip php7-mbstring php7-xmlrpc php7-intl php7-common php7-cli php7-bz2
adduser -D -h /home/container container
## Add a folder for TM-Server
mkdir -pv ${WORKDIR}/TrackManiaServer
cd ${WORKDIR}/TrackManiaServer
wget ${DEDICATED_URL} -qO ${WORKDIR}/TrackManiaServer/dedicated.zip
unzip -qo ${WORKDIR}/TrackManiaServer/dedicated.zip -d ${WORKDIR}/TrackManiaServer
chmod 775 -v ${WORKDIR}/TrackManiaServer/TrackmaniaServer
chown -Rv ${USER}:${USER} ${WORKDIR}

## Cleanup
rm -r ${WORKDIR}/TrackManiaServer/RemoteControlExamples
rm ${WORKDIR}/TrackManiaServer/CommandLine.html
rm ${WORKDIR}/TrackManiaServer/ListCallbacks.html 
rm ${WORKDIR}/TrackManiaServer/ListMethods.html
rm ${WORKDIR}/TrackManiaServer/manialink_dedicatedserver.txt
rm ${WORKDIR}/TrackManiaServer/Readme_Dedicated.html
rm ${WORKDIR}/TrackManiaServer/GameData/Config/dedicated_cfg.txt
rm ${WORKDIR}/TrackManiaServer/TrackmaniaServer.exe
rm -rfv /tmp/* /var/tmp/* /var/cache/apk/*
rm ${WORKDIR}/TrackManiaServer/dedicated.zip

## Configuration
# Make sure we use defaults everywhere.
: ${TITLE:="stadium"}
: ${DEDICATED_CFG:="dedicated_cfg.txt"}
: ${MATCH_SETTINGS:="MatchSettings/tracklist.txt"}
: ${SERVER_NAME:="GameMania.org Trackmania Server"}
: ${TM_SERVER_PORT:="2350"}

# Copy the configuration files if not yet copied.
mkdir -pv ${WORKDIR}/TrackManiaServer/GameData ${WORKDIR}/TrackManiaServer/GameData/Config ${WORKDIR}/TrackManiaServer/GameData/Tracks/MatchSettings
## {{{ config.txt
if [ ! -f ${WORKDIR}/TrackManiaServer/GameData/Config/${DEDICATED_CFG} ]; then
echo "<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>

<dedicated>
	<authorization_levels>
		<level>
			<name>${SUPERADMIN_NAME:-SuperAdmin}</name>
			<password>${SUPERADMIN_PWD:-SuperAdmin}</password>
		</level>
		<level>
			<name>${ADMIN_NAME:-Admin}</name>
			<password>${ADMIN_PWD:-Admin}</password>
		</level>
		<level>
			<name>${USER_PWD:-User}</name>
			<password>${USER_PWD:-User}</password>
		</level>
	</authorization_levels>
	
 	<masterserver_account>
		<login>${MASTERSERVER_ACCOUNT:-}</login>
		<password>${MASTERSERVER_ACCOUNT_PWD:-}</password>
		<validation_key>${MASTERSERVER_KEY:-}</validation_key>
	</masterserver_account>
	
	<server_options>
		<name>${SERVER_NAME:-}</name>
		<comment>
			${COMMENT:-}
		</comment>
		<hide_server>${HIDE_SERVER:-0}</hide_server>
		<max_players>${MAX_PLAYERS:-32}</max_players>
		<password>${SERVER_PASSWORD:-}</password>
		<max_spectators>${MAX_SPECTATORS:-32}</max_spectators>
		<password_spectator>${PASSWORD_SPECTATOR:-}</password_spectator>
		<ladder_mode>${LADDER_MODE:-forced}</ladder_mode>
		<ladder_serverlimit_min>${LADDER_SERVERLIMIT_MIN:-}</ladder_serverlimit_min>
		<ladder_serverlimit_max>${LADDER_SERVERLIMIT_MAX:-}</ladder_serverlimit_max>		
		<enable_p2p_upload>${P2P_UPLOAD:-True}</enable_p2p_upload>
		<enable_p2p_download>${P2P_DOWNLOAD:-True}</enable_p2p_download>
		<callvote_timeout>${CALLVOTE_TIMEOUT:-60000}</callvote_timeout>
		<callvote_ratio>${CALLVOTE_RATIO:-0.5}</callvote_ratio>
		<callvote_ratios>
			<voteratio command=\"Ban\" ratio="0.65"/>
		</callvote_ratios>
		<allow_challenge_download>${ALLOW_CHALLENGE_DOWNLOAD:-True}</allow_challenge_download>
		<autosave_replays>${AUTOSAVE_REPLAYS:-False}</autosave_replays>
		<autosave_validation_replays>${AUTOSAVE_VALIDATION_REPLAYS:-False}</autosave_validation_replays>
		<referee_password>${REFEREE_PASSWORD:-}</referee_password>
		<referee_validation_mode>${REFEREE_VALIDATION_MODE:-0}</referee_validation_mode>
		<use_changing_validation_seed>${USE_CHANGING_VALIDATION_SEED:-False}</use_changing_validation_seed>
	</server_options>
	
	<system_config>
		<connection_uploadrate>${CONN_UPLOAD_RATE:-90000}</connection_uploadrate>
		<connection_downloadrate>${CONN_DOWNLOAD_RATE:-90000}</connection_downloadrate>
		<force_ip_address>${FORCE_IP_ADDRESS:-}</force_ip_address>
		<server_port>${TM_SERVER_PORT:-2350}</server_port>
		<server_p2p_port>${SERVER_P2P_PORT:-3450}</server_p2p_port>
		<client_port>${CLIENT_PORT:-0}</client_port>
		<bind_ip_address>${BIND_IP_ADDRESS:-}</bind_ip_address>
		<use_nat_upnp>${USE_NAT_UPNP:-}</use_nat_upnp>
		<p2p_cache_size>${P2P_CACHE_SIZE:-4000}</p2p_cache_size>
		<xmlrpc_port>${XMLRPC_PORT:-5000}</xmlrpc_port>
		<xmlrpc_allowremote>${XMLRPC_ALLOW_REMOTE:-True}</xmlrpc_allowremote>
		<blacklist_url>${BLACKLIST_URL:-}</blacklist_url>
		<guestlist_filename>${GUESTLIST_FILENAME:-}</guestlist_filename>
		<blacklist_filename>${BLACKLIST_FILENAME:-}</blacklist_filename>
		<packmask>{$TITLE:-stadium}</packmask>
		<allow_spectator_relays>${ALLOW_SPECTATOR_RELAYS:-False}</allow_spectator_relays>
		<use_proxy>${USE_PROXY:-False}</use_proxy>
		<proxy_login>${PROXY_LOGIN:-}</proxy_login>
		<proxy_password>${PROXY_PWD:-}</proxy_password>
	</system_config>
</dedicated>
" > ${WORKDIR}/TrackManiaServer/GameData/Config/${DEDICATED_CFG}
fi
## config.txt }}}
## {{{ tracklist.txt
#cp ${WORKDIR}/GameData/Tracks/MatchSettings/Nations/NationsWhite.txt ${WORKDIR}/GameData/Tracks/${MATCH_SETTINGS}
wget ${TRACKLIST_URL} -qO ${WORKDIR}/TrackManiaServer/GameData/Tracks/${MATCH_SETTINGS}
## tracklist.txt }}}

## {{{ Startfile
## Create startfile
if [ ! -f ${WORKDIR}/start.sh ]; then
echo "cd /home/container/TrackManiaServer
/home/container/TrackManiaServer/TrackmaniaServer /dedicated_cfg=dedicated_cfg.txt /game_settings=MatchSettings/tracklist.txt /noautoquit
" > ${WORKDIR}/start.sh
fi
chmod 775 -v ${WORKDIR}/start.sh
## }}}

## {{{ xaseco
# Create new folder
mkdir -pv ${WORKDIR}/xaseco
cd ${WORKDIR}/xaseco
wget ${XASECO_DL} -qO ${WORKDIR}/xaseco/xaseco.zip
unzip -qo ${WORKDIR}/xaseco/xaseco.zip -d ${WORKDIR}/xaseco
rm ${WORKDIR}/xaseco/xaseco.zip
chown -Rv ${USER}:${USER} ${WORKDIR}

rm ${WORKDIR}/xaseco/Aseco.sh
rm ${WORKDIR}/xaseco/Aseco.bat
rm ${WORKDIR}/xaseco/AsecoF.sh

if [ ! -f ${WORKDIR}/xaseco/Aseco.sh ]; then
echo "#!/bin/sh
cd /home/container/xaseco
php aseco.php TMN </dev/null >aseco.log 2>&1 &
echo $!
" > ${WORKDIR}/xaseco/Aseco.sh
fi
chmod 775 -v ${WORKDIR}/xaseco/Aseco.sh

if [ ! -f ${WORKDIR}/xaseco/AsecoF.sh ]; then
echo "#!/bin/sh
cd /home/container/xaseco
php aseco.php TMF </dev/null >aseco.log 2>&1 &
echo $!
" > ${WORKDIR}/xaseco/AsecoF.sh
fi

chmod 775 -v ${WORKDIR}/xaseco/Aseco.sh
chmod 775 -v ${WORKDIR}/xaseco/AsecoF.sh
## xaseco }}}

variables.name: MASTERSERVER_KEY
variables.description: Master server key - The last 3 characters of your key!
